name: Hoppy Hunting Oculus Quest
description:
Hoppy Hunting is a VR Easter Egg Hunt Game available for the OculusQuest.

The Easter Bunny needs 40 eggs ready to go for tomorrow's parade. In TEN minutes!!! Up for the job ? You will need to collect them from Springtime Forest. A few things before you go, Point and press the trigger to wake up them eggs! The Hen Gun will help you against the giant chicks, and that there arrow on your hand will always lead you back to the farm! Hoppy Hunting! (:

We hope you enjoy it (:  Stay Home and Egghunt indoors!
